bibl.title: Petition to Appoint an epitropos: A New Document from the Archive of Aurelius Adelphios. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Petition of Aurelius Harpokra- addressed to the well known Aurelius Adelphios and the other gymnasiarch(s) of Hermopolis, 27 October 321 CE? - Introduction. - Text.
